data.text: @starbrooke1 i promise you that statement was completely unfounded and i can link like 15 scientific articles that prove so. and states can try to make this vaccine mandatory just as all immunizations are (for schooling & such) but people still choose to not get those vaccines either...

@cli_ker I’m not sure I believe it’s a myth.. if a head researcher comes out with a statement on it and a bunch of news outlets are saying it’s not true.. I’m listening to my gut on that one considering propaganda is alive and legal in the U.S.
New York created a bill making it mandatory.

@starbrooke1 the infertility is a complete and utter myth. and theres no chance it would be deemed mandatory by the govt. however companies like ticketmaster can make it mandatory in order to attend concerts. if you can afford a concert ticket you can afford the vaccine.
